name: Blake Deadly
text: Look what the cat dragged in.

name: Catherine Zeta-Bones
text: Tick tock tick tock tick tock...

name: Kirsten Dust
text: Hey! You! Help me outta here huh?

name: Buzz Blightyear
text: Hey Fleshy, think you could help me out, I've got an itch behind my jaw bone I can't seem to reach.

name: Aragone
text: Do you smell it.... that smell... that smelly smell that smells... smelly
